channel.title: Runescape Gold?
channel.description:
Does anyone know a legit gold selling site for Runescape that I can buy from? I'm thinking gold4rs possibly and I've purchased from them before but since the bot nuke I'm not too sure whether or not there legit anymore. I'm only purchasing 50$ in gold for my nephew so any advice would be nice.
-I posted this in general questions but me and another member thought it'd be more fitting here please don't try to say I'm spamming.

item.title: Runescape Gold?
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:15, topic:427405”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=530100.msg3870214#msg3870214 date=1325294411]

rswalmart, i bought 10mil just to test and it was delivered within 10mins after i went on live chat.

Dang, nice
[/quote]

ty?[/quote]

I was referring to the delivery time lol, not trying to sound creepy about you buying gold.

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:4, topic:427405”]I know it might sound weird but Craigslist, meet at a wifi spot. Someone was selling a white phat in my area for 200$. Just a suggestion.[/quote]It’s also a lot more risky. The pro is that you meet in real life, but that’s also a con.
